title: America’s New Oligarchy | Guests: Sen. Rand Paul & Mark Meckler | 1/26/21
description:
The world’s top business leaders urge Biden to focus heavily on climate change, as the Left’s hypocrisy on corporations is fully shown. The World Economic Forum’s push for the Great Reset has begun, and one billionaire proclaimed, “Capitalism is dead." Glenn shares the oligarchic trajectory America is headed down and says we too must change our language. Sen. Rand Paul joins to discuss why he’s calling President Trump’s second impeachment trial a “sham." Convention of States Action founder and president Mark Meckler talks his push to return power to the states. Dr. Fauci says two masks are better than one, so Glenn and Stu decide to go the extra mile. Anti-racism is definitively racism, but companies and people are still adopting it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
